original_title: Johanne Fontaine : toujours accro à la vie
overview: In this new production, Johanne is now facing a fourth cancer diagnostic. Despite having to fight this battle again, the 60-year-old wants to help others with workshops where she shares her doubts and thoughts. When she is asked how many times can you fight cancer, the warrior answers: “As many times as you can survive!”
title: Johanne Fontaine : toujours accro à la vie
